name: Always A Bigger Fish (fowlest)
description:
Completed in three days for the Vertex Game Jam, my first jam!
https://itch.io/jam/vertex-gamejam

Theme: Start Small

Starting as a small fish, eat as much food as you can and get bigger and stronger!  You can only eat fish smaller than you, so avoid similarly-sized or larger fish.

Use the WASD keys to swim.

Almost entirely made from free assets online.

Graphics:
Fish Pack from Kenney:
https://kenney.nl/assets/fish-pack

Lobby Time by Kevin MacLeod

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
